abstract: Disney acquired the 49.6 percent stake in the company that it did not already own, valuing the deal at about $450 million; it is hoping to leapfrog into one of the world’s fastest-growing markets.
snippet: Disney acquired the 49.6 percent stake in the company that it did not already own, valuing the deal at about $450 million; it is hoping to leapfrog into one of the world’s fastest-growing markets.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES – It’s full steam ahead for Mickey Mouse in India.

headline.main: Disney Adds to Its India Investment With Takeover of UTV Software
